title: Stranded in Egypt, Palestinians from Gaza dream of returning home
subhead: Some 80,000 Palestinians fled Gaza for Egypt after the Hamas attacks on Israel on October 7, 2023, and the subsequent war launched in retaliation. Without refugee status, they cannot settle permanently in the country. With the announcement of the opening of the Rafah border crossing, many of them want to return to the enclave despite the destruction.

title: Trump warns Iran of 'bad things' unless deal struck with US
Clintons to testify in US House-led Epstein investigation
Mark Carney, a prime minister seeking to free Canada from US dominance
subhead: As the international order recedes, the Canadian leader has moved on from the Trudeau era, when his predecessor was seen as naive on the world stage, in an effort to assert himself against hegemonic powers – starting with his American neighbor.

title: 'Donald Trump has struck at the heart of the defense pact forged between the US and Europeans in 1949: Trust'
subhead: The drama surrounding Trump's willingness to annex Greenland – by force or by negotiation – has dealt a lasting blow to NATO's credibility, explains Alain Frachon, a columnist for Le Monde.

title: At the Panthéon, artist Nicolas Daubanes turns to 10 sites of memory
subhead: With his striking suspended magnetic powder drawings, this history enthusiast evokes national sites marked by contemporary conflicts that have since become memorials.

title: Najannguaq Hegelund, Greenland's tireless activist for the Inuit cause
subhead: This 37-year-old woman, deeply involved in the nonprofit sector and a supporter of independence for the Danish autonomous territory, has established herself as one of the leading figures in the protests against Donald Trump's expansionist ambitions.

Iraq starts investigations into Islamic State suspects transferred from Syria
Frederik X, a monarch embraced by Greenlanders
subhead: Deeply attached to Greenland, where he once undertook a four-month expedition under extreme conditions, the king of Denmark is set to visit the island this month. Meanwhile, Donald Trump has not abandoned his ambition to claim it as American territory.

title: Two years after France introduced specialized units to combat domestic violence, results are mixed
subhead: The French Justice Ministry says most judicial and appeal courts have set up these units, which aim to provide a cross-disciplinary approach to handling domestic violence cases. On the ground, however, advocacy groups and lawyers remain cautious about the reform's impact.

title: An AI clone and a publicly traded company: The irresistible rise of TikToker Khaby Lame
subhead: The Senegalese-Italian influencer has sold his company for nearly $1 billion in a deal that includes the creation of a digital twin powered by artificial intelligence.

title: Environment: Europe's temptation to unravel hard-won progress, ignoring scientific truth
The need to speak truth about immigration
Zaki Laïdi, political scientist: 'In 2025, building spheres of influence is infinitely more difficult than during the Cold War'
